settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.
settings.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive email notifications about important updates.
settings.dataDesc: Manage your data and export options.
settings.exportDesc: Download your data in CSV format.
settings.clearDesc: Remove all your data from the system.
settings.profileUpdatedDesc: Your profile has been updated successfully.
settings.preferencesUpdatedDesc: Your preferences have been updated successfully.
settings.uploadNotImplementedDesc: Avatar upload will be available soon.
settings.exportInProgress: Your data export is being prepared.
settings.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.

landing.title: Smart Resume Analysis Platform
landing.subtitle: Revolutionize your hiring process with AI-powered resume analysis and candidate search. Find the perfect match faster than ever.
landing.uploadDescription: Upload resumes in bulk and get instant AI-powered analysis with skill extraction and candidate scoring.
landing.smartSearchDescription: Search through thousands of candidates using intelligent filters and AI-powered matching algorithms.
landing.integrateDescription: Seamlessly integrate with your existing workflow and streamline your hiring process.
landing.aiDescription: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze resumes and extract key insights automatically.
landing.bulkDescription: Process hundreds of resumes simultaneously with our high-performance analysis engine.
landing.linkedinDescription: Direct integration with LinkedIn for expanded candidate search and profile analysis.
landing.filteringDescription: Intelligent filtering system that learns from your preferences and improves over time.
landing.analyticsDescription: Get instant insights into your recruitment pipeline with comprehensive analytics dashboard.
landing.storageDescription: Enterprise-grade security ensures your candidate data is protected and compliant.
landing.readyToTransform: Ready to Transform Your Hiring Process?
landing.transformSubtitle: Join hundreds of companies already using our platform to find top talent faster and more efficiently.
landing.candidateSearchDescription: Connect with millions of top-tier candidates using revolutionary AI search technology. Identify hidden gems, niche specialists, and ideal cultural fits beyond the reach of traditional recruiting methods.
landing.noCreditCardRequired: No credit card required • 14-day free trial • Cancel anytime
landing.powerfulFeaturesSubtitle: Everything you need to revolutionize your recruitment process and find exceptional talent
landing.whyChooseTitle: Join thousands of companies that have revolutionized their hiring process and discovered top talent they never knew existed.
landing.lovedByTeamsSubtitle: See how TalentSpark is transforming recruitment for leading companies
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of HR professionals who have revolutionized their recruitment process and discovered top talent with TalentSpark's AI-powered platform.

features.aiPoweredDescription: Advanced AI algorithms analyze resumes in seconds, extracting key skills, experience, and qualifications with 98% accuracy.
features.intelligentSearchDescription: Find perfect candidates from your database or external sources using natural language queries and smart filtering.
features.comprehensiveDatabaseDescription: Find perfect candidates from your database or external sources using natural language queries and smart filtering.
features.lightningFastDescription: Process hundreds of resumes in minutes, not days. Get instant insights, rankings, and match scores.
features.biasFreeDescription: Eliminate unconscious bias with objective, data-driven candidate evaluation and fair assessment algorithms.
features.perfectMatchingDescription: Find ideal candidates using our proprietary skill-matching algorithm and cultural fit assessment.

searchFeatures.smartQueryDescription: Use natural language to find candidates: 'Senior React developer with 5+ years in fintech'
searchFeatures.advancedFilteringDescription: Filter by location, salary, experience, skills, education, and 50+ other criteria
searchFeatures.multiSourceDescription: Search across headhunter.uz, Linkedin or your own candidate database
searchFeatures.aiRecommendationsDescription: Get AI-suggested candidates based on your hiring patterns and success metrics

benefits.reduceTime: Reduce hiring time by up to 80%
benefits.improveQuality: Improve candidate quality with AI insights

testimonials.testimonial1: TalentSpark revolutionized our hiring. The headhunter search feature helped us find senior developers we couldn't reach before - filled 3 positions in 2 weeks!
testimonials.testimonial2: The candidate database search is incredible. We found perfect matches for niche roles that would have taken months to fill traditionally.
testimonials.testimonial3: Best investment in HR tech. Our time-to-hire dropped from 45 to 12 days, and candidate quality improved dramatically.

auth.checkEmailForVerification: We've sent a verification link to {email}. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
auth.termsAndPrivacy: By signing up, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.

dashboard.linkedinSearchDescription: Find professionals on LinkedIn with AI-powered analysis
dashboard.hhSearchDescription: Search through headhunter.uz database for potential candidates

upload.title: Resume Upload & Analysis
upload.subtitle: Upload multiple resumes and get instant AI-powered candidate analysis
upload.requirementsPlaceholder: Describe key requirements, skills, and qualifications...
upload.fileRestrictions: PDF files only • Maximum 10 files • 1MB max each
upload.aiAnalysisDescription: Our advanced AI extracts candidate information, calculates experience metrics, identifies key skills, and provides intelligent match scores based on your specific job requirements.
upload.maxTenFiles: Please select maximum 10 files at once.
upload.maxFileSize: Each file must be smaller than 1MB
upload.filesSkippedDescription: The following files exceed 1MB and were skipped: {{files}}
upload.selectPdfFiles: Please select at least one PDF file to process.
upload.provideTitleAndRequirements: Please provide both job title and requirements.
